title: HormonalCare
trustedBy: Trusted by Patients and Specialists Across Peru
footerVision: Our vision is to provide convenience and help increase your sales/business.
heroSub: Your digital ally in hormonal health.
heroTitle: TRACK, UNDERSTAND, AND IMPROVE YOUR HORMONAL BALANCE
heroDesc: HormonalCare helps you manage your health with expert endocrinologists, personalized treatment plans, and real-time monitoring.
howWorksDesc: A simple and efficient process to help you connect with specialists and track your hormonal health.
step1Desc: Enter your personal data and health background to personalize your care.
step2Desc: Choose a specialist, date, and time that fits your schedule – all online.
step3Desc: Connect with your endocrinologist through secure video chat and receive treatment guidance.
plansTitle: Choose the plan that fits your practice
plansDesc: Start for free. Upgrade as your patient list grows. All plans include secure access, patient tracking, and clinical tools.
testimonialsDesc: Discover how HormonalCare is improving lives through efficient medical tracking and virtual consultations.
testimonial1Text: “Thanks to HormonalCare, I was able to consult with a specialist from home. The platform is intuitive and saved me from long clinic waits.”
testimonial2Text: “As an endocrinologist, HormonalCare helps me organize my patients, review uploaded results, and follow up efficiently from anywhere.”
testimonial3Text: “I used to wait over 2 weeks for an appointment. Now with HormonalCare, I receive treatment adjustments in just one call.”
name: Name
